price: Na siku hiyo tutawaacha wakisongana wao kwa wao. Na baragumu litapulizwa, na wote watakusanywa pamoja.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
footnotes: Na tangu kujengwa boma hilo Juju-wa-maajuju wakabaki nyuma yake wakipambana wenyewe kwa wenyewe, na wengine wakasalimika na shari yao. Ikifika Siku ya Kiyama likapulizwa baragumu Mwenyezi Mungu atawakusanya viumbe wote kwa ajili ya hisabu na malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
